author: Adrian Collins
description:
We are partnering with Podium Audio and narrator Philip Battley to bring Richard Swan’s The Scour to your ear holes. Grab your audio copy, throw on a thick water-resistant coat, turn down the lights, and strap in for one of the best dark fantasy novellas of 2025. We have a free sample below for you to […]

The post The Scour by Richard Swan available in audio appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: The Scour by Richard Swan available in audio

author: Z.B. Steele
description:
We got a chance to sit down with indie star and dark fantasy author Michael Michel—most known for his work on his flagship series Dreams of Dust and Steel. We talked about his books, rapid releases, the dangers of belief, Christmas, and who the GOAT of SFF is. [GDM]: Hey Michael, thanks so much for doing this […]

The post INTERVIEW: with author Michael Michel appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: INTERVIEW: with author Michael Michel
